title: Moonmote
content:
Baldur's Gate 3. Moonmote is a unique action that can be exclusively executed with Selune's Spear of Night. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
